DOC.brief_summary: A randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled parallel-group study , compare bioequivalence triamcinolone acetonide aqueous nasal spray ( Apotex , Inc. ) Nasacort® AQ nasal spray ( Sanofi-Aventis Pharmaceutical Products , Inc. ) treatment seasonal allergic rhinitis .
